con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="TaxServiceEndpointService" targetNamespace="http://taxservice.estafet.com/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://taxservice.estafet.com/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://taxservice.estafet.com/"> <xsd:element name="taxRequest" type="tns:taxRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="taxRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="invoiceType" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="taxRequestResponse" type="tns:taxRequestResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="taxRequestResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="percent" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="createTaxRequest" type="tns:createTaxRequest"/> <xsd:complexType name="createTaxRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="taxName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="invoiceType" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="taxPercent" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="createTaxResponse" type="tns:createTaxResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="createTaxResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="code" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="taxRequestResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:taxRequestResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="taxRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:taxRequest" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createTaxRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:createTaxRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createTaxResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:createTaxResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="TaxService"> <wsdl:operation name="taxRequest"> <wsdl:input message="tns:taxRequest" name="taxRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:taxRequestResponse" name="taxRequestResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="createTax"> <wsdl:input message="tns:createTaxRequest" name="createTaxRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:createTaxResponse" name="createTaxResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="TaxServiceEndpointServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:TaxService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="taxRequest"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://taxservice.estafet.com/taxRequest" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="taxRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="taxRequestResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="createTax"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://taxservice.estafet.com/createTax" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="createTaxRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="createTaxResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="TaxServiceEndpointService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:TaxServiceEndpointServiceSoapBinding" name="TaxServiceEndpoint"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:10354/tax_service"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:config.con:query: INSERT INTO tax (tax_name, invoice_type, tax_percent) VALUES ('TestTax','TestType', 0.2);
DELETE FROM tax WHERE tax_id IN (SELECT tax_id from tax WHERE tax_name = 'TestTax' AND invoice_type = 'TestType');
SELECT * from tax WHERE tax_name = 'TestTax' AND invoice_type = 'testType'
DELETE FROM tax WHERE tax_id IN (SELECT tax_id from tax WHERE tax_name = 'TestTax' AND invoice_type = 'testType');
